about_the_game:
“Presidents Fight” is a combat game that pits the presidents of major powers against each other in a struggle for world domination.

“War is a place where the young kill one another without knowing or hating each other, because of the decision of old people who know and hate each other, without killing each other” - Erich Hartmann

Now all that is about to change, pitting presidents from around the world against each other in epic bouts of international conflict resolution. Welcome to the ring of the United Nations! Choose your favorite president and defeat your political adversaries to fight your way to world domination. Feel the fury of international politics.

Presidents Fight has influences from great fighting games like Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat, Tekken or Soul Calibur, with characters inspired by the presidents of major powers, such as Biden, Putin, Jinping, Kim Jong-un, Trump, Johnson, Macron, Trudeau, Kishida, Scholz, Merkel, Moon, Modi, Morrison, and many more. There is also a special character called "The People" who represents popular sovereignty. Select your favorite president or let off steam by beating the ones you like the least.
detailed_description:
“Presidents Fight” is a combat game that pits the presidents of major powers against each other in a struggle for world domination.

“War is a place where the young kill one another without knowing or hating each other, because of the decision of old people who know and hate each other, without killing each other” - Erich Hartmann

Now all that is about to change, pitting presidents from around the world against each other in epic bouts of international conflict resolution. Welcome to the ring of the United Nations! Choose your favorite president and defeat your political adversaries to fight your way to world domination. Feel the fury of international politics.

Presidents Fight has influences from great fighting games like Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat, Tekken or Soul Calibur, with characters inspired by the presidents of major powers, such as Biden, Putin, Jinping, Kim Jong-un, Trump, Johnson, Macron, Trudeau, Kishida, Scholz, Merkel, Moon, Modi, Morrison, and many more. There is also a special character called "The People" who represents popular sovereignty. Select your favorite president or let off steam by beating the ones you like the least.
legal_notice: No Politicians Were Harmed in the Making of This Film. This is a work of fiction. Any similarity to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events, is purely coincidental.
name: Presidents Fight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: iAMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: adeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: The fighting game that pits presidents from around the world against each other in hand-to-hand combat. The most fun way to resolve international conflicts.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Finnish*, Greek*, Dutch*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*
*languages with full audio support
